sentences: On Saturday, 29 September, Leo Meyer, Chair of the IPCC Financial Task Team, introduced a draft decision on the IPCC Work Programme and Budget for 2002-2004.
He noted that 2002 would be a quiet year for the IPCC, but that resource demands will increase thereafter as preparations for the Fourth Assessment Report begin.
He also noted that there was a substantial carry-over from 2001.
Chair Watson proposed to add a provision in the budget for the publication of the Synthesis Report as a stand-alone document.
Delegates accepted this proposal, and the budget was approved.
